problem.markdown:
1. Solenoid valve is an ____________ device used for controlling ________ . ( ) Electromechanical, gas and liquid (x) Electrochemical, liquid ( ) Electrochemical, gas ( ) All 2. Sensors which are available for point level detection of solids are : ( ) Admittance type ( ) Vibrating point (x) All ( ) Rotating paddle
3. Level sensor are used to delete the level of substances that flow, which include ________ ( ) Slurries ( ) Granular material ( ) Liquids (x) All
4. A proximity sensor is a sensor able to detect the presence of nearby objects __________ . ( ) With physical contact (x) Without physical contact 5. The maximum distance that proximity sensor can detect is defined as__________ (x) Nominal range ( ) Midrange ( ) Both Midrange and Nominal range
problem.p: 1. Solenoid valve is an ____________ device used for controlling ________ .
